message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for both of us. This product, which I believe is worth more than $1,200,000 to me, offers unparalleled benefits and experiences that I'm confident will significantly enhance your life or business. Given its true worth and the unique attributes it possesses, I am extending this exclusive offer to you at a price of $950,000. I understand that this might be a substantial investment, but I assure you that the value it brings far exceeds the cost. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if there's any way I can provide additional information to help you make an informed decision.
